captions.text:
- Hey Justin.
- Hmm?
Never mind, I forgot.

- Hey Quinta, are you coming
to my party on Saturday night?
- I will be there.
- Hey Quin are you coming to my
poetry slam this Saturday night?
- Wouldn't miss it for the world.
- Quinta you said you were coming
to my party on Saturday night.
- Oh crap.
- Check out this video it's really funny.
- Okay.
Oh no, that's seven minutes long.
That's preposterous.
- Hey don't forget to BYOB to my party.

- Oh, BYOB.
I love BYOB.
Although, I don't think it's right
to have people bring outside liquor.

One time I went to this party
and this girl had it open bar.
It was so cool.

But her name was Samantha and
I don't really like Samanthas.
Justin, should I date this guy?

- Shh, stop.
- What's your mom like?
Does it sound like the Nutcracker?
- No.
- Hey Justin, can you help me do a J cut.

- I don't know what that is.
- Yeah.
- Um, you go to your sequence here.

Highlight that.
Hit option A.

Then you just wanna
drag it over like that.

There you go.
You got a J cut.
(laughing)

- [Quinta] No way.
That's ridiculous.
Yeah, like my birthday's coming up too so
I definitely wanna go.

- Can't tell if she likes me.
It sucks.

- You didn't have a
dream Martin Luther King.
I'm sorry.
- We are a results oriented company

and what I feel like we're
lacking in right now is results.
- [Quinta voiceover] I wonder what I'm

gonna have for dinner.
Chicken or fish.
I also wonder who'd win in a fight.
A chicken or a fish.

The chicken definitely, but
if they were under water
then the fish has a fighting chance.

But that's just absurd.
- Quinta, your thoughts.
- Um, I think that the graphs are great.
- What graphs?

title: What It’s Like To Have A Short Attention Span

I'm not maybe this bad but usually when I try to do homework I end up doing 
15 other things instead and before I notice it's 2am, I've cleaned the 
house, sewn some pants, made cookies, eaten the said cookies, organized my 
books and I still haven't even started on the homework. Everything is so 
distracting...﻿

comments.author: Water Flash (Waterflash)

comments.text:
As someone with bad ADHD I can tell you this is pretty much me everyday. 
Even with my meds I'm easily distracted and forgetful and it's horrible. 
BuzzFeed videos are great for people like me -they're funny but not usually 
much longer than 2 or 3 minutes so I don't get too distracted :P ﻿
comments.author: Sassy Slytherin

comments.text:
My main problem is zoning out. I don't even know if it counts as a short 
attention span because I haven't moved on to something new, I'm just kinda 
staring into the distance... a very serious obstacle when we're doing 
something in class that involves long instructions.﻿
comments.author: Pyrite Paladin

comments.text:
Yeah, this is my life. Living with distraction is a really big thing I'm 
still trying to overcome. It's better than before but it's still a lot 
taking over my life omg.﻿

It's a curse really XD ﻿

comments.author: Olivia Jones

comments.text:
+ClearMythicGaming  have it too, im constantly working very hard on my 
attention span everyday and i can manage to learn academic stuff with a LOT 
of effort, you have to come up with different techniques and they dont last 
for long so that a continuous struggle and you feel like its unfair others 
have it so easy they can just sit and learn, but when you got the knowledge 
it doesnt get out, and then you get in a group at work and you feel like 
you really bring something to the group because of the creativity :D

comments.text:
I have ADHD and parts of this are me. When I was in college, I'd be doing 
homework, even after like only 5 minutes, I'd move onto watching some porn, 
Youtube videos, etc., and it would be like 3-4 hours later, and I'd blame 
myself. I also suck at absorbing information, instructions and directions. 
I have to take out a piece of paper and write shit which takes time, 
annoying the person giving the information, instructions and directions. I 
also daydream a lot, even in the middle of a thought. And I talk 
excessively.﻿
